name: Fenugreek (Ground)
properties: Traditional spice in Ethiopian and Indian cuisine
Used in small amounts for depth of flavor
Complements other warming spices (cumin, coriander, turmeric, cardamom)
benefits: Fenugreek is a traditional spice with anti-inflammatory properties used in Ethiopian and Indian cuisines. It adds complex, slightly bitter notes to bean and greens dishes. Works synergistically with other anti-inflammatory spices like turmeric, cumin, and coriander to create layered flavor profiles.
amount: 1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon ground fenugreek seeds per recipe (4 servings)
